short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: URL blocking for specific time periods of a day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The app will allow you to specify the URLs you wish to be blocked, and the blocking time periods of each day of week.  You can use keywords to block all URLs that contain the keywords
